i.name: Assassin's Mark
i.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

q.name: Five Point Strike
q.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.

w.name: Twilight Shroud
w.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

e.name: Shuriken Flip
e.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing physical damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.

r.name: Perfect Execution
r.description: Akali leaps in a direction, stunning and damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.

description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Akali's''' [[ability damage]] against enemy {{tip|champions}} creates a 500-unit ring around them for 4 seconds and grant her {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|4|key=%|40 to 70|1 to 16}} '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds while moving away from them.
When '''Akali''' leaves the ring, she regains the {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains ''Swinging Kama'' for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Swinging Kama:}} '''Akali's''' next basic attack gains {{sti|range|125 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{pp|18|39|42|45|48|51|54|57|60|69|78|87|96|105|120|135|150|165|180|color=magic damage}} {{as|(+ 90% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}} and restores {{sti|energy|{{as|{{pp|3|10 to 30|1;8;13}} energy}}}}.
i1.name: Assassin's Mark
notes: ** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges within ''Swinging Kama''<nowiki>'</nowiki>s duration, '''Akali's''' total range increases to {{tt|337.5|(125 + 125){{times}}1.35}}.
** If ''Rapid Firecannon'' fully charges before gaining ''Swinging Kama'', '''Akali's''' total range is increased to {{tt|395|125{{times}}1.35{{plus}}125{{times}}1.35{{times}}1.35}}.
* The ring will create around the last target hit of ''{{ai|Five Point Strike}}''.

riot.name: Assassin's Mark
riot.description: Dealing spell damage to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next autoattack with bonus range and damage.

riot.name: Five Point Strike
riot.description: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power and slowing.
riot.tooltip:
Slings kunai in an arc, dealing {{ damage }} magic damage. Enemies at the tip are briefly slowed.

At max rank, deals {{ miniondamage }} damage to minions and monsters.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' throws a flurry of kunais in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. Enemies hit at maximum range are also {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
At rank 5, deals 33% '''bonus''' damage to {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|25 to 125}} {{as|(+ 65% AD)}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Minion and Monster Damage at Rank 5|{{ap|25*1.33 to 125*1.33}} {{as|(+ {{fd|86.45}}% AD)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|66.5}}% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Five Point Strike

riot.name: Twilight Shroud
riot.description: Akali drops a cover of smoke. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible and unable to be selected by enemy spells and attacks and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.
riot.tooltip:
Drops a smoke bomb, unleashing a spreading cover of smoke lasting {{ baseduration }} seconds.

The smoke obscures Akali from enemy vision and grants her {{ e6 }}% movement speed.

Entering or exiting obscured extends Shroud's duration.

description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Akali''' restores {{sti|{{as|energy}}}} and detonates a smoke bomb in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain.

Entering the shroud renders '''Akali''' {{tip|invisibility|invisible}}, gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and causing all sources of {{tip|true sight}} (except for {{tip|turrets}}) to grant {{tip|obscured vision}} instead.

'''Akali's''' basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility for {{pp|5|type=minutes|changedisplay=true|round=3|1|0.9|0.825|0.725|0.625|1|8|11|20|30}} seconds. ''Twilight Shroud's'' duration is extended by 3 seconds if she breaks invisibility.
The {{ai|Shuriken Flip|Akali|marked}} section of ''Twilight Shroud's'' will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.
w1.name: Twilight Shroud
notes: * If '''Akali''' is shrouded, turrets will only reveal her within the turret's attack range rather than sight range.
* It is possible for '''Akali''' to detonate the smoke bomb on the far side of terrain from her current location.
* '''Akali''' briefly {{tip|obscured vision|obscures}} before stealthing or re-stealthing even if enemies don't have true sight in the area.
* Against '''Akali''' targeted abilities and uncancellable basic attacks (e.g. {{cai|Siphoning Strike|Nasus}}) do not cancel when '''Akali''' stealths or re-stealths.
* Both enemy and ally '''Akalis''' benefit from ''Twilight Shroud's'' effects.

riot.name: Shuriken Flip
riot.description: Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing physical damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing additional damage.
riot.tooltip:
Flip backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing {{ damage }} physical damage and marking the first enemy or smoke cloud hit.

Re-cast: Dash to the marked target, dealing {{ e2damagecalc }} physical damage.

description: {{sbc|First Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|flips}} backward and fires a shuriken forward, stopping with the first enemy hit and dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}}.
The shuriken ''marks'' the enemy or the last {{ai|Twilight Shroud|Akali|smoke}} section hit for 3 seconds. While the target is marked, '''Akali''' can reactivate ''Shuriken Flip''.

{{sbc|Second Active:}} '''Akali''' {{ct|dash|dashes|attack=false|move=false|cast=Usable. E is disabled for 10 seconds. R will interrupt|items=true,,,interrupts|spells=true,interrupts,true,false}} towards the marked target, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies deals {{as|physical damage}}.
leveling: {{st|Dash Damage|{{ap|50 to 170}} {{as|(+ 140% '''bonus''' AD)}}|Total Damage|{{ap|70+50 to 210+170}} {{as|(+ 210% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
e1.name: Shuriken Flip
notes: * Killing an enemy with the shuriken will still mark the last area of the Shroud hit.

riot.name: Perfect Execution
riot.description: Akali leaps in a direction, stunning and damaging enemies she strikes. Re-cast: Akali dashes in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes.
riot.tooltip:
Two dashes: The first vaults over enemies, micro-stunning and dealing {{ cast1damage }} physical damage. Akali can dash again after {{ cooldownbetweencasts }} seconds.

The second is a piercing thrust that executes, dealing {{ cast2damagemin }} to {{ cast2damagemax }} magic damage based on missing health.

description: {{sbc|First Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|physical damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies hit for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
After {{fd|2.5}} seconds, ''Perfect Execution'' can be reactivated within the following {{fd|7.5}} seconds.

{{sbc|Second Active:}} '''Akali''' {{tip|dash|dashes}} in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit, increasing by {{as|{{pp|11|key=%|key1=%|type=target's '''missing''' health|0 to 200|0 to 70|displayformula=2.86% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health, capped at 70% '''missing''' health}}|health}}.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Magic Damage|{{ap|85 to 215}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Magic Damage|{{ap|85*3 to 215*3}} {{as|(+ 90% AP)}}}}
r1.name: Perfect Execution
